targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeFrom() as "time",
  ifnull((SELECT
   SUM(Allocation)
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeFrom() AND Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1),0) as "Allocation"
UNION
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
FROM Allocations
WHERE $__timeFilter(Date) AND Activity in ($VO)
GROUP BY Date
UNION 
SELECT 
  $__timeTo(),
  (SELECT SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeTo() and Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1)

SELECT
  Date as "time",
  VO,
  SUM((WallDuration*IF(CpuCount=0,1,CpuCount))/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) AS ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: Average Core Usage by Activity and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  VO,
  SUM((WallDuration)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) AS ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: Elapsed time (months) by Activity and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  VO,
  SUM((CpuDuration)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) AS ""
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY Date

panels.title: CPU time (months) by Activity and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Date as "Month",
  VO,
  Site,
  SUM((WallDuration*IF(CpuCount=0,1,CpuCount))/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(Date))*86400)) as "Average Core Usage"
FROM VCombinedSummaries
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Date) and Project in ($Project) and Site in ($Site) and VO in ($VO) and SourceSchema in ($Source) and VOGroup in ($VOGroup)
GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
ORDER BY Date desc, VO, Site

panels.title: Average Core Usage by Month by Activity by Site
